title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Virtual-Based Short-Term Intensive Course for Nursing Clinical Judgment Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Nursing Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Identify patient condition changes with 80% accuracy and determine emergency response priorities through virtual scenario training
Define 50 core clinical judgment terms with over 90% accuracy using a mobile-based quiz system
Achieve level 3 or higher on a 4-tier evaluation system for communication skills with multicultural patients through role-play simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
